## Evaluation?

After all this developmental effort[^0]:

* is the extra longitudinal processing worth it?  I.e., is it better than just processing data through the cross-sectional pipeline?

* And, if so, do we process in native space or SST space?

Although ANTs processing has certain advantages (just as FreeSurfer has advantages),

* can we determine if the cortical thickness measures are somehow "better" than FreeSurfer's?

* And can we do it in a more general way than has been done previously?
